scope: Provides access to Chibi Scope functionality.
scope.writeLine: Write string to the Chibi Scope
scope.writeLine|param|message: the message you want to write to the Chibi Scope, eg: "Hello!"
scope.writeNumber: Write number to the Chibi Scope
scope.writeNumber|param|num: the number you want to write to the Chibi Scope, eg: 0
